#      – Where to put files when calling 'make install'

#      BUILD_SHARED_LIBS
#      – Switch between shared and static libraries

# Configure gucefMULTIPLAY

  include/gucefMULTIPLAY.h
  include/gucefMULTIPLAY_CMultiPlayControl.h

  src/gucefMULTIPLAY_CMultiPlayControl.cpp
  src/gucefMULTIPLAY_CPassiveURLServerListProvider.cpp
  src/gucefMULTIPLAY_CServerList.cpp
  src/gucefMULTIPLAY_CServerListProvider.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( gucefMULTIPLAY ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
add_dependencies( gucefMULTIPLAY gucefCOM gucefCOMCORE gucefCORE gucefMT)
target_link_libraries( gucefMULTIPLAY gucefCOM gucefCOMCORE gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( gucefMULTIPLAY PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS GUCEFMULTIPLAY_BUILD_MODULE )
GUCEF_config_lib( gucefMULTIPLAY )
